search.query: | mcatalog values(host) as host WHERE `delphix_metrics_index` | mvexpand host | sort "host" | table "host"

| mstats avg(_value) as current where host="$host$" AND `delphix_metrics_index` metric_name="system.capacity.consumer.size" span=30m by data.totalSpace, data.consumerName | eval usage = round((current) / 1024 /1024, 2) | eval totalGB=round('data.totalSpace' / 1024 / 1024 / 1024, 3) | eval name = 'data.consumerName'| chart avg(usage) as "Usage (MB)" avg(totalGB) as "Total (GB)" by name

| mstats avg(_value) as current where host="$host$" AND `delphix_metrics_index` metric_name="system.capacity.consumer.size" span=30m by data.totalSpace, data.consumerName, data.objectType | eval usage = round((current) / 1024 /1024, 0) | eval totalGB=round('data.totalSpace' / 1024 / 1024 / 1024, 0) | eval name = 'data.consumerName' | eval type = 'data.objectType' | stats avg(usage) as "Usage (MB)" avg(totalGB) as "Total (GB)" by name, type

| mstats avg(_value) as current where host="$host$" AND `delphix_metrics_index` metric_name="system.capacity.consumer.size" by host, data.totalSpace, data.consumerName | eval usageGB = round(current / 1024 / 1024 /1024 , 2) | eval capacityGB = round('data.totalSpace' / 1024 / 1024 /1024 , 2) | eval dataset = 'data.consumerName' | stats first(usageGB) as TotalU, first(capacityGB) as TotalCap by dataset, host | stats sum(TotalU) as Gtotal, first(TotalCap) as GCap by host | eval pct_usage = round(Gtotal / GCap * 100, 2) | eval compare_usage = Gtotal." / ".GCap | stats first(pct_usage) as "Used (%)" first(compare_usage) as "Usage GB(used/total)" by host
